about.description: Full Stack Developer with 3 years of experience in designing, developing, and implementing web applications and APIs. Specialized in modern technologies such as React, Node.js, Python, and PHP, with a focus on building scalable, efficient, and user-centered solutions. Experienced in system integration, process optimization, and collaborative work environments under agile methodologies. Seeking to contribute to challenging projects where I can apply my technical skills and continue growing professionally.
